name: PONG BREAKER 360
description:
A retro style pong and brick breaker inspired arcade game modernized in all 360 directions for a new exciting mobile gaming experience.

A brick breaker pong game that is not restricted to one direction.

Clean, minimal, colorful game window design with retro handheld inspired joypad controller design. A virtual handheld gaming experience on a mobile.

"Hi, it's my first game release (trying it on the android mobile! ) I chose this concept for my first game as a nod to first hit retro games. Try the game and give your comments and suggestions." ~ DBVVV (VijayaVarman Vandayar).
